name: Sasha's Stupid Coffee Shop
description: Start your coffee business from a small $20 loan, and grow it into the World's best coffee! Strategically buy enough ingredients to get you through the day, but don't overstock, as they can spoil. Set your prices carefully in order to attract the most customers. Plan ahead by checking the next day's weather forecast. The colder temperatures attract more customers. Hopefully you can make enough to retire!
